name: A Story of Creation
description:
! IMPORTANT INFORMATION ! :

-you can ground pound to REGAIN your PLATFORM-

-you DONT get your platform back on SKIN-

-you can have MULTIPLE PLATFORMS at once-

- you can shoot THROUGH WALLS-

I hope this helps. sorry my in game tutorial seems to not do its job properly 

some more tips :

- wall jumps are done while jumping from a wall while not holding in one direction

- ground pounding on a platform gives you a lot of height - use it

- the intro can be skipped by holding space

tutorial for the first skin area:

1. ground pound to get a platform

2. shoot the platform so that you can cross the first gap 

3. ground pound again

4. jump on your first platform and then shoot the second one to cross the second gap

5. profit

(btw you can ground pound to escape the skin area if you messed up)

A Story of Creation is a short , difficult platformer made for the kindred community jam #6 with the theme "At the beginning ... there was nothing"

You are life. Newly born from the blood that is everything you know. And so you make your way to reach the heart in the center of the caves and tunnels, flesh and veins to gain all the power of the world that despises you. 

Controls:

move: A,D, / left, right / d-pad left, d-pad right / control stick

jump: W / Up / Cross 

ground pound: S, Down /  r1, l1  

shoot platform:  F,X,Z, / square, circle

volume: ESC / options

toggle interface: f4 / select

Mechanics:

You can shoot your platform only after ground pounding.

The platform can be shot through walls.

If you ground pound on a platform you bounce higher.

Bubbles refill your platform.
